pros: great atmosphere and support on campus

- Competitive salary
- Focus on learning and development
cons: - Could require a lot of work at times

pros: Small environment, incredible students, wonderful colleagues.  Encourages professional development.  Good opportunities to work closely with students and faculty. Strong comittment to excellence in teaching and learning.
cons: Leadership has been spotty and that has hurt the work culture at times.  New budgetary cutbacks have been felt across the board and a reorganization has left some wondering about the rationale for what resulted.

review_title: One of the best organizations to work for in Doha
pros: Good people, prestigious organization, strong values.
cons: Years of poor management are hard to overcome. Some outstanding people work here but management has been too tolerant of marginal or "bossy" behavior.
